title: College Physics A Strategic Approach 3rd c2015 Vol1 Knight txtbk
description:
College Physics: A Strategic Approach, 3rd Edition (c2015), VOLUME 1 (Parts I-IV, Chapters 01-16), textbook by Randall D. Knight, Brian Jones & Stuart Field.

TEXTBOOK INFO: <a href=" http://www.pearsonhighered.com/educator/product/9780321879721.page" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.pearsonhighered.com/educator/product/9780321879721.page</a>

COURSES: Algebra-Based Physics.
(college = algebra-based ; university/for engineers & scientists = calculus-based)

BRIEF CONTENTS:
--------------

FILE INFO: paginated, bookmarked, screen-captured & OCR'ed PDF (178 MB) with good enough resolution for EVALUATION. A largish light gray watermark is embedded in each (rasterised) page but should not interfere with your EVALUATION of this text. Complete from cover to cover.
Compressed (zipped): *right-click* the filename (.7z) & choose *Extract* to convert to PDF; discard the .7z file (container) when done with seeding.

(VOLUME 2 will be made available separately later for EVALUATION)
